Text: David Limbaugh = brother of Rush Limbaugh, biggest fucking blowhard, moron douchebag in the U.S.  This is just propaganda bullshit aimed at the retards on the extreme right.

So you posted just to prove you haven't read the book? 

Hey, everybody, look at ziffel323...what a dick.

@spanikopita, I would not be too quick to call other people a dick. 

First, spanikopita is a great dish and you are not.

Second, both of the Limbaugh kids are nutjobs. In an older time, the might have found work as the 'village idiot'...

Third, you show you have no respect for the right of free speech, since you want a limbaugh(not to be confused with the hindenburg-another nazi gasbag) to be able to spout his nonsense, but you are quick to jump all over ziffel323 for daring to have an opinion you don't approve of. 

Fourth, well maybe you can get an adult to explain it to you.
Just because Limbaugh is an a-hole, doesn't mean he's not right about Obama being one too.

shamanist. what an interesting viewpoint. And here I was criticizing ziffel for NOT reading the book. Not for liking/hating Limbaugh. And one was Lindberg...not too many people are confused by that, but thanks for instructing us. I had nothing to say about his opinion. I called him a dick because I don't think ziffel has the background to criticize the book. But he criticizes Limbaugh's opinion. You criticize what you think is my opinion. So who's shouting down free speech? You. Shout me down. Shout down the Limbaugh brothers. 

Just so you know, I am in the minority for ENSURING that you have that right. And I paid for it dearly. You got an interesting spin on things. Guess that's typical for flaming a torrent.

Spinach Pie for everyone!
Zakimar Hates Limbaugh..big surprise, who doesn't he hate. More Proof Limbaugh has it all right.
